<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 441, 718, 456]]<|/det|>
Write your Centre number, candidate number and name on all the work you hand in.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 457, 320, 471]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 472, 465, 486]]<|/det|>
You may use a pencil for any diagrams or graphs.  

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 487, 598, 501]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 502, 380, 515]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 532, 254, 546]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 547, 652, 561]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 562, 380, 575]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[92, 576, 892, 605]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 606, 450, 619]]<|/det|>

<|ref|>text<|/ref|><|det|>[[94, 636, 606, 650]]<|/det|>
